root: ^I accidentally saw our neighbor put money into his secret cache. I keep thinking about it, what should I do?
^Forget it, I don't want to get involved with any criminal
^Prepare a good plan and rob him
^I know a couple of outlaws to fix it with. For a tip, I can get my share
^Tell the neighbor to be careful with his money

res1: ^I have better things to do with my life; and money, I can earn myself
^I accidentally saw our neighbor put money into his secret cache. But I made myself forget about it.
res2: ^I took the money and she didn't work and she did well the police have questioned everyone around including me but in vain
^I accidentally saw our neighbor put money into his secret cache. I prepared a plan of robbery and took the money.
res3: ^I took the money and hid it well. The police have questioned everyone, including me, but they had nothing
^I accidentally saw our neighbor put money into his secret cache. I tipped off a couple of outlaws about it and had my share. I'm also in the gang now.
res4: ^Our neighbor thanked me and gave me twenty bucks. What a cheapskate!
^I accidentally saw our neighbor put money into his secret cache. I told my neighbor to be careful with his money, and he thanked me and gave me twenty bucks. What a cheapskate!
